transcripts.text: Carlton Pearson here again with another word for your soul and for yourself.  This is the month to transform your life.  Make the conscious decision to walk into this new year with a new mindset and the intention to create new, exciting experiences.  In January, this January, you will be celebrating success.  You are doing that.  Receiving good news and watching the blessing flow in like magic.  Everything your heart desires can now become your reality.  I declare and decree that for you.  And I really believe it's your reality.  Again, you know I love you and I believe in you.  Umshante.
